SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: A study event during which the treatment assignment is made known to the subject, investigator, and/or other trial personnel.

The subject or parent/guardian withdraws their consent for the subject to participate in certain protocol-specified study activities, but does not withdraw consent from participation in the study as a whole.
SKOS_CONCEPT.notation: WITHDRAWAL OF CONSENT FROM PROTOCOL-SPECIFIED ACTIVITY
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: Withdrawal of Consent From Protocol-Specified Activity
